p: Biofilm progression analysis using time lapses microscope - Fig. 8A-C indicate the Time lapses microscopic images of forming biofilms of C. albicans (ATCC MYA-2876); C. dubliniensis (ATCC MYA-646) and C. tropicalis (ATCC 750) without essential oil treatment, 0.5 mg/mL, 1.0 mg/mL and 2.0 mg/mL C. verum leaf oil treatment for 24 h time period.
